item.title: Taean-gun, South Korea - Flower path to the sea, Taean Cheongpodae Caravan Village
item.description:
Caravan camping grounds with a view of Cheongpodae Beach

Flower path to the sea, Taean Cheongpodae Caravan Village

Taean-gun, South Korea

The heyday of Korean camping is still ongoing. But for beginners it's hard to find a lot of camping gear. Of course, it is not easy to care about the economic burden and learn how to use it. Camping is a taste of equipment, but I don't want to do that. . Then the alternative is caravans! Camping atmosphere to the fullest, more comfortable than my home base, there is a great view of the West Sea and upscale trails! Cheongpodae Caravan Village is such a place.
I'm from the original caravan of mic ~
Taean Cheongpodae Beach is very accessible from Chungcheong area, Seoul, metropolitan area and Jeolla Province. Two hours will be enough if you avoid routine stoppages like weekend mornings
Meet a group of caravan troops in the middle of a small Cheongpodae beach. Today's base camp! Cheongpodae Caravan Village.
Cheongpodae Caravan Village
Cheongpodae Caravan Village overlooks the vast West Sea in the future and leans back to the pine forest. The campsite, run by a young broken woman, has eight caravans. They are all from the waters of the caravan's original country of `` Mikuk ''.
Caravan Village Entrance
Maid in USA inscribed with a yellow lacquer on the bumper guarantees this. That little paint pride. He is not made in China but Mije. In those days, Made in USA was synonymous with luxury goods. It's been a while since I met you. 'Nice to meet you!'
View from the inside of the caravan
Cheongpodae Caravan Village's most prominent feature is its 'large'. A total of eight caravans are big at a glance. "Others are for 4-6 people, but we operate for couples." The owner's explanation. Smart! Try to get inside. 'Isn't it a caravan?' The prominent courtesy misses nicely. In addition to the double-bed queen size bedroom, the kitchen, living room and bathroom have a shower booth. Eight caravan interiors also vary. The caravan is an experience product, so the differentiation strategy is to have a different feeling every time it comes.
Cheongpodae Caravan Village
We didn't come to see the house, but delay the caravan admiration in the evening and go out to the sea in front of you! As soon as you exit the entrance guarded by the giant Indian dolls, the white sandy beach of Cheongpodae Beach begins. After passing the small windbreak forest, it is Cheongpodae Beach.
Bunk beds for children
Best sea promenade
The ocean is right in front of the caravan, so you can measure the temperature of the West Sea with your big toe in less than a minute, but it's not fun. I decided to eat some of the main dishes, then eat appetizers first.
Flower path to Cheongpodae Beach
Go up 300m to the right from the entrance of Cheongpodae Caravan Village and you will find many nice pensions with views of the sea. In front of the pension, there is a beautiful flower garden on the white sand beach.
Flower path to Cheongpodae Beach
The flower paths that seem to come out of fairy tales unfold in the background of the sea. Especially, yellow wildflowers forming a colony attract visitors.
Cheongpodae Beach Boardwalk
The flower path of seduction leads to the sea, and the seaside road parallel to the West Sea provides a nice walk for Cheongpodae visitors. Walking slowly down the Cheongpodae beach with the cool sea breeze, I can see that the campsite owner said, "There are 34 beaches in Taean. In fact, the caravan business has been fascinated by the charm of Cheongpodae.
Cheongpodae where you can enjoy the quiet beach
Cheongpodae Beach is small and still free. Since the peak season, there are plenty of spaces at the auto camping ground and the beach is just enough to take you to the sea.
Cheongpodae where you can enjoy the quiet beach
On one of the sandy beaches, children riding four-wheeled motorcycles became gods. At night, it also turns into a rustic fireworks display.
Cheongpodae
It is downtown of Cheongpodae off the sandy beach. There are several food trucks in the small vacant lot, and another caravan colony with the beach back. The Stream of Maison transforms the caravan into a small beer firm and a small stage. But accommodation is not possible.
You can ride a four-wheeled motorcycle on the beach
Caravan's Magic
The pride of the West Sea is the wide tidal flat. Water drains on the beach, revealing a wide tidal flat. Since it is a tidal flat of a tourist spot, it is different from the real tidal flat of Namdo, but it is popular among children.
Tidal Flats
If you catch small shellfish, you do not know how to go and squat on the mud flat and become one with the sea.
The harvest isn't good, but the children are immersed in the tidal-flat experience.
Another attraction of the West Sea is a nice sunset. When the weather is clear, red sunsets moisten the sea water more than Hongsi. If there is a lot of clouds, you will continue to stare at the horizon of the West Sea, where the sun is falling to the wide horizon.
The harvest isn't good, but the children are immersed in the tidal-flat experience.
The darkness lies on Cheongpodae Beach, where the sun is hidden. A softly lit caravan and a dad or boyfriend in front of the grill produce the typical mise en scene.
The night came to the caravan camping ground.
Finally camping flowers, barbecue time! The advantage of barbecues is that any food can be reborn as the best food when sizzling on fire. However, you should eat quickly before the food cools off and before the smell goes away.
Campsite night
After dinner, go inside. The children are already on the caravan bunk bed. The sofa in the living room opens up into a nice bed. I saved my sleeping bag and lantern from the main island. Take a cool shower, take a canned beer from the fridge, and watch a drama on your HDTV. All of them are caravans.
"Are you all done?" Camping Flower! Barbecue
Travel info

Cheongpodae Caravan Village
-Address: 1308, Anmyeon-daero, Nam-myeon, Taean-gun, Chungcheongnam-do South Korea
Contact: 010-2449-1946
http://www.sunsetcamp.co.kr/
